nodes.text: Tholoth was a planet located within the Tholoth system of the Colonies.
Tholoth was inhabited by a Near-Human species known as Tholothians; they often wore distinctive Tholoth headdresses.
During the Galactic War, several force-sensitive adults inexplicably turned homicidal.
Jedi Master Stass Allie was Tholothian, as well as Jedi Initiate Katooni. Adi Gallia was of Tholothian descent though raised on Coruscant.
